description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的市，位于台湾西北部，为新竹都会区的中心城市。因九降风强盛而被称为“风城”，是全球高科技代工产业的重镇。
description.en: A city in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, located in the northwestern part of Taiwan. It is the central city of the Hsinchu metropolitan area. Known as the "Windy City" due to strong seasonal winds, it is a major hub for the global high-tech contract manufacturing industry.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党籍，现任新竹市代理市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Taiwan People's Party, currently serving as the acting mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党籍，曾任新竹市市长，因贪污案一审有罪而被停职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Taiwan People's Party, formerly the mayor of Hsinchu City, suspended from office after being convicted of corruption in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党之一。
description.en: One of the political parties in Taiwan.

nodes.id: 高虹安贪污案一审判决

zh-cn: 高虹安贪污案一审判决

description.zh-cn: 台湾台北地方法院就高虹安于立法委员任内涉嫌贪污案进行一审宣判，判决其有罪。
description.en: The Taipei District Court's first-instance verdict in the corruption case against Kao Hung-an regarding her tenure as a legislator, finding her guilty.

location.zh-cn: 新竹市东区、新竹县宝山乡

description.zh-cn: 台湾的第一个科学园区，是台湾高科技产业发展的核心之一，吸引了大量国内外厂商投资与高科技人才进驻。
description.en: The first science park in Taiwan, it is a core hub for the development of Taiwan's high-tech industry, attracting significant domestic and international investment and high-tech talent.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的产业技术研发机构，于1973年由经济部联合工业研究所、联合矿业研究所、金属工业研究所合并设立。
description.en: A technology research and development institution in Taiwan, established in 1973 by merging the Union Industrial Research Laboratories, the Mining Research & Service Organization, and the Metal Industries Research & Development Centre.

en: Office of the Governor-General of Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期的最高统治机关。
description.en: The supreme ruling body during the period of Japanese rule in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾最早成立的工业研究机构之一，前身为台湾总督府成立的天然瓦斯研究所，后合并入工业技术研究院。
description.en: One of the earliest industrial research institutions in Taiwan, formerly the Natural Gas Research Institute established by the Office of the Governor-General of Taiwan, later merged into the Industrial Technology Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 源自中国福建省南部地区的汉族民系，是台湾主要的族群之一。
description.en: A Han Chinese subgroup originating from the southern part of Fujian province in China, one of the major ethnic groups in Taiwan.

nodes.id: 台湾省行政区划重划 (1950年)

zh-cn: 台湾省行政区划重划 (1950年)

description.zh-cn: 1950年台湾省政府进行的一次大规模行政区划调整，影响了多个县市的层级与范围。
description.en: A large-scale administrative division reform conducted by the Taiwan Provincial Government in 1950, which affected the status and boundaries of many counties and cities.

description.zh-cn: 新竹市与新竹县香山乡合并，并重新升格为省辖市的行政事件。
description.en: The administrative event where Hsinchu City merged with Hsiangshan Township of Hsinchu County and was re-promoted to a provincial city.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初的军事家、政治人物，建立了台湾的第一个汉人政权。
description.en: A military leader and statesman during the late Ming and early Qing dynasties who established the first Han Chinese regime in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝福建泉州同安县人，于1691年获准带领亲族及同乡至竹堑地区进行拓垦，是早期开发新竹的重要人物。
description.en: A native of Tong'an County, Quanzhou Prefecture, Fujian, during the Qing dynasty, who was granted permission in 1691 to lead his relatives and fellow villagers to develop the Zhúqiàn (Hsinchu) area, becoming a key figure in the early development of Hsinchu.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，无党籍，为新竹市升格为省辖市后的首任市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, independent, who served as the first mayor of Hsinchu City after its promotion to a provincial city.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang, who served as the mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang, who served as the mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, who served as the mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang, who served as the mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang, who served as the mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, who served as the mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 位于新竹市的军用机场，为中华民国空军新竹基地的一部分，曾于1998年短暂开放军民两用。
description.en: A military airport in Hsinchu City, part of the ROC Air Force Hsinchu Base. It was briefly opened for joint military-civilian use in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 1998年国华航空公司一架自新竹起飞的班机发生坠毁事故，导致新竹机场停止民航服务。
description.en: In 1998, a Formosa Airlines flight crashed after taking off from Hsinchu, leading to the suspension of civil aviation services at Hsinchu Airport.

description.zh-cn: 新竹市于1718年建城，是北台湾闽南人最早建立的城市。
description.en: Hsinchu City was founded in 1718 and was the earliest city established by Hoklo people in northern Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1936年，台湾总督府在新竹市成立天然瓦斯研究所，后发展为联合工业研究所。
description.en: In 1936, the Office of the Governor-General of Taiwan established the Natural Gas Research Institute in Hsinchu City, which later evolved into the Union Industrial Research Laboratories.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，联合工业研究所与联合矿业研究所、金属工业研究所合并设立工业技术研究院。
description.en: In 1973, the Union Industrial Research Laboratories merged with the Mining Research & Service Organization and the Metal Industries Research & Development Centre to establish the Industrial Technology Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代初期新竹科学园区的设立，吸引了大量投资和高科技人才，极大地促进了新竹市的发展。
description.en: The establishment of the Hsinchu Science Park in the early 1980s attracted significant investment and high-tech talent, greatly promoting the development of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 1661年郑成功取得台湾统治权后，大量汉人来台开垦，其势力范围广及竹堑（今新竹），推动了该地区的早期开发。
description.en: After Koxinga took control of Taiwan in 1661, a large number of Han Chinese migrated to the island for reclamation, and his influence extended to Zhúqiàn (modern-day Hsinchu), promoting the early development of the area.

description.zh-cn: 1691年，王世杰获准带领亲族同乡至竹堑地区垦植，形成闽南人移民聚落，是新竹早期开发的关键人物。
description.en: In 1691, Wang Shijie was granted permission to lead his relatives and fellow villagers to cultivate land in the Zhúqiàn area, forming a Hoklo immigrant settlement, making him a key figure in Hsinchu's early development.

relationships.source: 台湾省行政区划重划 (1950年)

description.zh-cn: 在1950年的行政区划重划中，新竹市由省辖市降为县辖市。
description.en: In the 1950 administrative rezoning, Hsinchu City was downgraded from a provincial city to a county-administered city.

description.zh-cn: 1982年7月1日，新竹市与香山乡合并，并重新升格为省辖市。
description.en: On July 1, 1982, Hsinchu City merged with Hsiangshan Township and was re-promoted to a provincial city.

relationships.source: 高虹安贪污案一审判决

description.zh-cn: 因贪污案一审被判有罪，高虹安于2024年7月26日被停职新竹市市长职务。
description.en: Due to a guilty verdict in the first instance of a corruption case, Kao Hung-an was suspended from her duties as mayor of Hsinchu City on July 26, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 高虹安于2022年12月25日就任新竹市市长，于2024年7月26日因案停职。
description.en: Kao Hung-an took office as mayor of Hsinchu City on December 25, 2022, and was suspended from office on July 26, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 原任副市长邱臣远于2024年7月26日起代理市长职务。
description.en: Originally the deputy mayor, Chiu Chen-yuan began serving as acting mayor on July 26, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 1998年国华航空一架自新竹起飞的班机坠毁，该事故导致新竹机场于同年9月起停止民航服务。
description.en: In 1998, a Formosa Airlines flight crashed after taking off from Hsinchu, which led to the suspension of civilian flight services at Hsinchu Airport starting from September of the same year.
